index.html:
<html><head><link href="https://cdn.syncfusion.com/ej2/28.1.33/{{theme}}.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
            body{
                touch-action:none;
            }
            .control-section{
                margin-top:100px;
            }
        </style></head><body><div class="stackblitz-container {{theme}}">
<div class="control-section">
    <style>
        @font-face {
                    font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
                    src:url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
                    font-weight: normal;
                    font-style: normal;
                }
            
                .e-ddb-icons {
                    font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
                    speak: none;
                    font-size: 55px;
                    font-style: normal;
                    font-weight: normal;
                    font-variant: normal;
                    text-transform: none;
                    line-height: 1;
                    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
                    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
                }

                @font-face {
                font-family: 'e-ddc-icons';
                src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
                font-weight: normal;
                font-style: normal;
                }

            .e-ddc-icons {
                font-family: 'e-ddc-icons';
                speak: none;
                font-size: 55px;
                font-style: normal;
                font-weight: normal;
                font-variant: normal;
                text-transform: none;
                line-height: 1;
                -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
                -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            }

                .e-reset::before {
                content: "\e715";
                font-size: 18px;
                }

                .material .e-reset::before {
                    content: "\e70a";
                }

                .bootstrap .e-reset::before {
                    content: "\e722";
                }
            
                .e-add::before {
                    content: "\e705";
                }
            
                .e-update::before {
                    content: "\e703";
                }
            
                .e-delete::before {
                    content: "\e701";
                }
            
                .material .e-add::before {
                    content: "\e704";
                }
            
                .material .e-update::before {
                    content: "\e702";
                }
            
                .material .e-delete::before {
                    content: "\e707";
                }
            
                .bootstrap .e-add::before {
                    content: "\e706";
                }
            
                .bootstrap .e-update::before {
                    content: "\e708";
                }
            
                .bootstrap .e-delete::before {
                    content: "\e700";
                }
            
                .e-toolbar .e-toolbar-items .e-toolbar-item .e-tbar-btn.e-btn.e-tbtn-txt .e-icons.e-btn-icon {
                    padding: 3px;
                }
                .showDropdown {
                    display: none;
                }
            </style>
    <div style="width: 100%;height: 10%">
        <div id="toolbar" style="width:100%;height: 10%;margin-top: 10px;">
        </div>
    </div>
    <div style="width: 100%;height: 80%;border-width: 0 1px 1px 1px; border-style: solid; border-color:#D7D7D7">
        <div id="diagram-space" class="sb-mobile-diagram">
            <div id="diagram"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div id="editDialog">
    <div class="showLabel">
        <input id="Description">
    </div>
    <div class="showLabel" style="padding-top: 14px">
        <input id="Color">
    </div>
    <div class="showDropdown">
        <input type="text" id="SourceId">
    </div>
    <div class="showDropdown" style="padding-top: 14px">
        <input type="text" id="TargetId">
    </div>
</div>



</div></body></html>
